能.definition: can; to be able to; might possibly; ability; (physics) energy

能上能下.definition: ready to take any job, high or low

能人.definition: capable person; Homo habilis, extinct species of upright East African hominid

能伸能屈.definition: can bow and submit, or can stand tall (idiom, from Book of Changes); ready to give and take; flexible

能否.definition: whether or not; can it or can't it; is it possible?

能夠.definition: to be capable of; to be able to; can

能屈能伸.definition: can bow and submit, or can stand tall (idiom, from Book of Changes); ready to give and take; flexible

能弱能強.definition: to be either weak or strong both have their purpose (idiom)

能彀.definition: able to do sth; in a position to do sth; same as 能夠|能够

能歌善舞.definition: can sing and dance (idiom); fig. a person of many talents

能者多勞.definition: (idiom) it's the most capable people who do the most work (intended as consolation for the overworked, or flattery when making a request etc)

能詩善文.definition: highly literate; lit. capable at poetry, proficient at prose

能說會道.definition: can talk really well (idiom); the gift of the gab

能願動詞.definition: modal verb (e.g. 肯[ken3], 能[neng2], 會|会[hui4], 要[yao4], 該|该[gai1], 得[dei3], 願意|愿意[yuan4 yi4], 可以[ke3 yi3], 可能[ke3 neng2], 敢[gan3], 應該|应该[ying1 gai1])
